products.name: Mexican hot sauce
products.facts: ["Mexican hot sauce typically contains ingredients like chili peppers, vinegar, and salt, ensuring a bold flavor profile.","Many Mexican hot sauces use sustainably sourced chili peppers, promoting ecological farming practices.","Quality Mexican hot sauces are often made with all-natural ingredients, free from artificial preservatives and additives.","Some brands prioritize eco-friendly packaging, using recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact."]
